subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: The death of a sailor, the bickering over rule changes, the threat of boycotts and the name-calling of a team have hurt the lead-up to the America’s Cup.
snippet: The death of a sailor, the bickering over rule changes, the threat of boycotts and the name-calling of a team have hurt the lead-up to the America’s Cup.
